 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Congratulations to Our Supply Chain Stars!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2010&user=10620> 	

Our STAR Team has proudly secured a spot among the Top 30 Global Supply Chain Leaders at the prestigious Alcott Global Awards 2025.

Often referred to as the “Oscars of Supply Chain,” these awards celebrate the world’s best Supply Chain and Operations leaders, recognizing innovation, resilience, and excellence across industries.
Being recognized alongside global giants like L’Oréal and Microsoft, and having our name displayed on the Nasdaq Billboard in New York, reflects the hard work, innovation, and spirit of our talented Operations team. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2010&user=10620>

Often referred to as the “Oscars of Supply Chain,” these awards celebrate the world’s best Supply Chain and Operations leaders, recognizing innovation, resilience, and excellence across industries.
Being recognized alongside global giants like L’Oréal and Microsoft, and having our name displayed on the Nasdaq Billboard in New York, reflects the hard work, innovation, and spirit of our talented Operations team. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2010&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Join The Greenhouse's Fireside Chat

The reality of raising capital in today’s market and what investors really want to see. Join us for inights on fundraising strategies, investor metrics, and navigating valuations. Whether you’re working with startups, exploring investments, or curious about funding, this session is for you.

Seats are limited — sign up now! <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2011&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2011&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Vision 2033 - 33 Days Challenge

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2012&user=10620> 	

Day 8 of our Vision 2033 – 33 Day Challenge!

Today, Zahra Kassim, Chief Investment Officer, highlights the importance of having a clear investment strategy when acquiring product brands.
